mapper.select: select b.pointShopBasketno,b.goodsId,g.goodsName,g.goodsImage,g.pointAmount, b.amount from pointshopbasket b, pointShopGoodsInfo g where id=#{id} and (b.goodsId = g.goodsId) order by pointShopBasketno desc
mapper.update:
select nvl(max(pointShopBasketno),0) from pointshopbasket where goodsid=#{goodsId} and id=#{id}
MERGE INTO pointshopbasket b USING ( SELECT #{goodsId} goodsid, #{id} id FROM dual ) src ON (b.goodsid = src.goodsid and b.id=src.id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET b.amount = b.amount + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (b.pointshopbasketno, b.goodsid,b.id) VALUES (pointshopbasket_seq.nextval,src.goodsid, src.id)
